players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. Maybe someone else did. I suspect Diana had something to hide. Alice, your deduction may be wrong."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and found him mafia. Bob knows I'm detective, so he must lie. Charlie was killed, so Bob is the killer. Vote him."
Diana: "Alice, if your investigation found Bob mafia, why did you claim that? Bob says he didn't kill. Either Bob is lying or Alice is. I think Bob is mafia."
You: "Bob, you know I'm detective. You lied about Charlie. Vote me and Diana for you. Vote Bob."
Bob: "Alice, I think your investigation was misread. I was checking you, not Bob. Diana has too many lies. Vote her."
Diana: remained silent.
